lines.text: You have the right to remain silent, so shut the fuck up, okay? You have the right to an attorney. If you can't afford an attorney, we'll provide you with the dumbest fucking lawyer on earth. If you get Johnny Cochrane, I'll kill ya!
Leo Getz, private investigator.

[into phone with fake accent]
Private investigator? Yes, Mr. Getz, I was just wondering if you'd be willing to investigate my privates.
Investigate what?
My privates, you stupid shit - shut the fuck up!
Hey Riggs, who's the perp? What did ya bust him for?

Oh, I'm a perp? You see a young brother in the back of a police car, automatically I'm a perp. Look at my suit, look at my tie. What do I look like, the fuckin' Crip's accountant? Look at this badge, bitch. Check out the gun.
Whoa, hey hey hey, put the gun down, put the gun down.
Flied lice?
Flied lice? It's fried rice, you plick.
[Interrogating Uncle Benny in a dentist's office full of nitrous oxide]
I'm sleeping with my wife's two sisters.
You lucky sonofabitch.
Good for you, Uncle Benny.
Not so good when my wife finds out.
[Butters is pointing a gun at Leo's head after being mistaken for a perp]
License. Registration. Urine Sample.
Hey, hey, hey, German Jews didn't have it any easier when we were kids, so don't think you're the only one, okay? Okay? Besides, I was just kiddin' with ya. I can smell a cop a mile away.
Oh, I smell bad, what'chu trying to say?
Well, stop turning everything around. You're so damned touchy. Hey, we might even work together, me and those two work together, I'm the bomb, they'll tell ya, I'm great.
Yeah, we're gonna work together as soon as I open up a cereal factory, ya fucking leprechaun.
Hey, I didn't call you names, ya fuckface! Don't start now!
Oh Leo
Hey Riggs
You want to get yourself shot is that It
No
What the hell are you doing here?
I was tailing you
I leave you alone okay I mean I guess you want to be alone
Okay I appreciate it
you know when I was a kid I had a pet frog
What?
Just give me a second let me tell you this okay...

Eh I had this pet frog, his name was froggy he was my best friend in the whole world, I didn't have a lot of friends, as a matter of fact okay I had no friends, and eh I used to kiss the frog too, I thought maybe eh that it would turn into a princess since I was a boy, and eh it could be my mother, they told me that she left or something, and my father was no bargain, and so just the frog, froggy was my friend and I really loved him, and I took him everywhere with me, and I was riding on my bike one day and he jumped out of the box, and eh I ran him over with the back tire I killed him, I was really heartbroken, really, he was my best friend in the whole world, the only thing I ever loved and then I met you and roger, and you guys really looked after me a lot more then you had to.
I am terrible to you Leo.

No no, it's okay, it's okay, you are my family, you are my friends... you are not better friends then froggy, you are just different, and eh, I just thought that maybe that might be relevant... okay I leave you alone now.
Assault gun... who's this joker?
I don't know, spokesman for the NRA, maybe.
Regular asshole. What do we do now?
Run him over.
What if he turns around and shoots us with that assault rifle?
Well he hasn't yet. Have you thought about that?
Well, what if he does?
Don't be a don't-be, be a do-be. Come on, Rodge, be positive.
Positive?
Yeah!
Well, let's run him over!
Good, I'm glad you see things my way.
Yeah, yeah, I hope he doesn't turn around!
He won't turn around. We'll creep up on him, nice and slow, so he won't notice.
Okay...
Will him not to turn.
[starts the car forward]
Will him?
The power of positive thinking. Don't turn around... don't turn around... Come on, I need you, man!
Don't turn around!
Believe it! We're better than him! We're better than him!
Don't turn!
That's it. Don't turn...
[the human tank turns]
He's turning.
AH, SHIT!
[Riggs swerves the car to the side and they both duck as the tank opens fire]
So this must have been what Uncle Benny meant by Four Fathers. Looks like Japan's version of the Marx brothers. Let's see we got Groucho, Harpo, Chico, and uh, Fucko.
You wanna get married, don'tcha?
Yes I do.
Why didn't you tell me?
Because I didn't want to put any pressure on you, Riggs. I mean, if you want to someday, that'd be great; if you don't, I love you. I'll take you any way I can get you, Riggs.
My time is reserved for police officers with REAL problems and REAL needs. HAVE YOU GOT THAT? HAVE YOU?
Care to run that by me again?
No! And do you know what? I don't like you.
[she walks away]
Stephanie?

[turns around, shocked]
Stephanie...?
I can't go out with you. I'm in a relationship, I'm very happy. Now you'll find somebody someday, but you've got to stop bothering me...

[painfully embarrassed]
You're disgusting. YOU'RE DISGUSTING!
[to onlookers]
What's the matter with you people?
Since I met you, I done some hairy shit, but this is not gonna happen. I'm gonna be a grandfather; you and Lorna are gonna have a baby. He ain't worth dying for, Riggs. He ain't worth it.

Yeah, yeah, you're right. Hey, if he gets away, we can track him down later on with a - you know, with a Howitzer or somethin'. Your son-in-law's over there bleedin', we should get him and get the hell out of here. Anyway, it's rainin'.
Yeah, it's rainin'.
I'm too old for this shit, too.
Guy's too damned good.
Well, yeah, he's damn good. I mean, how did he do that thing with the gun? How the hell did he do that? I mean, he took my gun apart with one deft move. How did he do that? Huh? How?
Yeah... okay. Let's go ask him.

Somebody took my phone number and called Afghanistan. Afghanastan. I've never talked to anyone in Afghanistan, I don't know nobody in Afghanistan, and even if did know anyone, I wouldn't talk to that Afghan ass for three hours. I won't talk to my daddy for three hours.
[Looking at a corpse]

Ah, shit. He's dead, man. He's fuckin' dead, man. Yeah, this is how he wanted to come to America, right? Where was he, in The Killing Section? This guy's been shot 4 times. At close range, like he was executed.
He WAS executed.
Yeah, by the crew.

What the FUCK, man? We got people gettin' killed left, right and center in this town; now we're IMPORTING victims? Hey, gangbangers wanna kill each other? No problem. You or me, one of us gets shot? Hey, occupational hazard. But just a normal guy, THIS fuckin' guy? What the fuck did he ever do to anybody? That ain't right.
I'll draw his fire and you run for cover.
No. No, no, no. *I'll* draw his fire and *you* run for cover.
What are you, out of your mind? You got a wife, kids. I got a lot less to lose than you.
Riggs, I wasn't supposed to tell you this, but Lorna's pregnant and you're gonna be a father.
No. Get going. Get... what did you say?
You're gonna be a father.
You okay, Riggs?
No, I'm NOT okay. I just had my ass kicked again.
It's like...
You're getting too old for this shit.
Yeah.
How about that? Finally.
No, I can't be. I mean, I'm only... Jesus.
Yeah, you're only. You can't beat the clock, Riggs.
We're dinosaurs headed for extinction.
Speak for yourself...
Gotta make way for the NEW-IMPROVED police department; guys with guns and psychology degrees, like Butters, out there.
Biter has a psychology degree?
More like a PSYCHO degree.
Ah, hell, I got nothin' against it; times have gotta change. Hey, I almost got shot by a hot-rodder with a zip gun; that's how far back *I* go.
What happened last night?
Oh, gunfight, explosions, sharks, you know, the usual.
You sure picked a strange angel, baby. But I got the message.
[Leo tries to find his bags on Roger's boat]
Okay, you said "aft," right?
A-F-T. Aft.
That's a fucking word?
In the back of the cabin on the right side, Leo.

Well, why didn't you say that in the first place, ROGER? I love these people. Put them around boats and water and all of the sudden everything becomes fucking nautical. "Astern. Avast you landlubbers. Man the bilge pumps." Pump your fucking ass.
What's goin' on Rog, why you lyin' to me? Where's the money coming from? IA says you're on the take.
You ever hear of Ebony Clarke?
Yeah, she writes those cheesy sex novels... why? You boinkin' her?
No I'm not boinkin' her, Trish is Ebony Clarke.
You *are* boinkin' her.

[big grin]
Yeah, Yeah I'm boinkin' her.
Plus they shot at me and Rog, and that pisses us off.
Really? Ha, too bad they missed!
[deleted scene]

[Gomez calls out Riggs from the boxing ring]
"I'm waiting old man"

[to Roger]
"Did he say old man?"

[to Martin]
He said "old man", old man.
[laughs]
Where's Lorna?
Oh, she's okay. I think she's on her third breakfast now.
I remember those days.
Uh, there's something I'm not supposed to tell you, too.
What?
Rianne's pregnant, you're going to be a grandfather.
Rianne's *what*?
[while the "Human Tank" is bearing down on them]
Here's what we're gonna do! Take your clothes off!
What the hell for?
What for?
Yeah!
Okay, you run, Flame-O here turns and sees you in your undies, it distracts him - I know it'd distract me - and that's when I shoot!
Shoot what?
The valve on that napalm tank!
You're gonna hit that itty-bitty valve before he shoots me?
Maybe.
*Maybe*?
[while the "Human Tank" is bearing down on them]
Is he black?
Too much armor on, I can't tell!
No, not him! The father of the baby!
...Okay!
Oh, please let him be black!
[Riggs comes home]
Hey. You look a little banged up.
Well, you look a little knocked up.
So who's the lucky, soon-to-be-dead son-in-law?
What I wouldn't give for a siren right now!

[sticking his head out the car window]
Aawwwww!
I'm not too old for this shit.
[Handing R&M their captain's badges]
This is one of the most painful fuckin' experiences of my life.

They fuck you with cell phones. That's what it is. They're fuckin' you with the cell phone. They love it when you get cut off. Y'know why, huh? You know why? 'Cause when you call back - -which they know you're gonna do. - -they charge you for that fuckin' first minute again at that high rate.
Nothing comes between a pregnant lady and a meal.
Since I met Riggs, I've had my house destroyed, my car wrecked, and now my BOAT SUNK. What's left?
I think that's about it.
It's about time they poured in some new blood. I just don't want it coming out of me.
I am getting married or there is no baby.
They fuck ya, they fuck ya, they fuck ya.
If this was Hong Kong, you'd already be dead
Hey Riggs, why did you call him my son-in-law?
'Cause I aaaam.
[interrogating Uncle Benny at a private dentist's office after accidentally filling the room with nitrous oxide]

[laughing and pointing to the gas mask that Butters is holding]
Hey... Hey, what's that you got there?

[laughing]
Uh... A nut cup? I got some big nuts.
[Roger takes the mask from Butters and inhales deeply]
That's nitro... oxide?

[laughing harder]
It's laughing gas.

[hysterical]
We... W-W-We're stoned.

[chasing a chinese suspect]
Stop in Chinese, motherfucker!
[a hysterical Lorna is in labor]
I am not ready to have this baby!
[the nurses ignore her and keep wheeling her in]
All right, fine, wheel me in if you want! My legs are staying closed!
